name: Flash Tap Free: The simple memory game
name_original: Flash Tap Free: The simple memory game
description:
Flash Tap Free is the simple and insanely fun memory game. Train your brain.

Play on your iPhone, iPad, or Apple Watch. Track your scores with Game Center.

How to play:
1. Watch the sequence
2. Tap back the sequence
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2
